title: unadu karuNaiyinri
sahitya:
unadu karuNaiyinri ulagilOr tuNaiyillai Om shuddha shakti mayamE


anupallavi

  Enadunakkenra hIna serukkinri sinaverip-paghaiyinri manadu nimmadi pera


caraNam    jAtip-pirivinaiyum samayap-pirivinaiyum salikkum arasiyalin saNDaip-piriviyanaiyum
Odiyum uNarAda bhEda vinaigaLum OyAdu vAyADi Uraik-kalakkAmal 
oDungi alai manam aDangi Anavam maDangi aruLinil iDam peTru dhiDam peTrE
Adi nIti vazhi bhEdamara naDandE jyOti shuddhAnanda vIdiyil ulaviDa
